channel.title: Sponsors on Ubucon Europe 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Sponsors on Ubucon Europe 2022

item.title: Become a sponsor
item.description: Thank you for your interest in Ubuntu and Ubucon Asia. As a non-profit and community organized event, Even Ubucon Asia 2021 is fully virtual event, We still need support from sponsors to make the event happen. By becoming one of our sponsors, you are directly contributing to research and development of Ubuntu and Open Source Software, and also making Open Source Community more active and sustainable. Your contribution makes it possible for us to bring a large number of Ubuntu users and contributors across Asia to connect, interact, help and learn together.

item.title: Join as Partner Community
item.description: To promote UbuCon Asia event across Asia much further, We’re looking for partner communities. By becoming our partner community, Your community will collaborate with UbuCon Asia team to cross-promote each other’s community and event. This will be a big help for both partner communities and UbuCon Asia to connect with even more diverse people and encourage them to participate and engage. To learn more about our partner community program, please refer to our brochure.
